title: Transfer of land owned by Janatha Estate Development Board in Pallai, Jaffna to the Coconut Cultivation Board
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. A.P. Jagath Pushpakumara, Minister of Coconut Development and Janatha Estate Development, to vest the land of about 600 acres in extent, adjoining the Tharmakerni Model Coconut Park, Pallai, Jaffna, belonging to the Janatha Estate Development Board, with the Coconut Cultivation Board, to establish a Model Coconut Park and for related activities, was approved by the Cabinet.
